thread.title: UK investigates Facebook over data breach

title: UK investigates Facebook over data breach
text:
UK investigates Facebook over data breach 9:03pm IST - 01:46 
Britain is investigating whether Facebook did enough to protect data after a whistleblower said a London-based political consultancy hired by Donald Trump improperly accessed information on 50 million Facebook users to sway public opinion. Sonia Legg reports.
